meanings.definition: The faculty or sense by which odors are perceived.
meanings.sent1: My dog has a keen smell for finding treats.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh cookies filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The smell of adventure was in the air as we packed for our trip.
meanings.sent4: The smell of success lingered in the room after the presentation.
meanings.sent5: The smell of flowers in the garden was overwhelming in its beauty.

meanings.definition: A sensation perceived by the olfactory nerves.
meanings.sent1: The pleasant smell of roses made her smile.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't ignore the foul smell coming from the garbage can.
meanings.sent3: The smell of victory filled the stadium as the team won the championship.
meanings.sent4: The smell of fear was palpable in the haunted house.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rain on the pavement brought back childhood memories.

meanings.definition: To perceive the scent or odor of something.
meanings.sent1: I can smell the delicious dinner cooking in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: She could smell the smoke from the distant fire.
meanings.sent3: I smell trouble brewing between those two friends.
meanings.sent4: He could smell the opportunity for success in the air.
meanings.sent5: The detective could smell a mystery waiting to be solved.
